readability_reflection: string concatenation. using the '+' operator makes sense since we learned that '+' means to add.
comprehension_debugging: string concatenation was easier to debug. string interpolation got messy since we have to deal with parenthesis also and it got confusing
preference_rationale: string concatenation. its easier to read and debug
learning_curve: Since I've been coding for 5 years, concatenation is more familiar to me since its used in most prograwmming languages
suggestions_improvement: string concatenation is fine. string interpolation is tricky though. I'm not sure if theres a solution to make string interpolation easier to read
